vars.processors:
- dissect:
    tokenizer: "/nsm/import/%{import.id}/zeek/logs/%{import.file}"
    field: "log.file.path"
    target_prefix: ""
- script:
      lang: javascript
      source: >
        function process(event) {
          var pl = event.Get("import.file").slice(0,-4);
          event.Put("@metadata.pipeline", "zeek." + pl);
        }
- add_fields:
    target: event
    fields:
      category: network
      module: zeek
      imported: true
- add_tags:
    tags: "ics"
    when:
      regexp:
        import.file: "^bacnet*|^bsap*|^cip*|^cotp*|^dnp3*|^ecat*|^enip*|^modbus*|^opcua*|^profinet*|^s7comm*"
